idea: Just to give you a brief intro on us, We are a Mumbai Based Photography firm catering to entire India. We started doing Contemporary Wedding Photography few years back and formed our team. idea:
Solid wastes are those organic

and inorganic waste materials produced by various activities of the society, which have lost

their value to the first user. Solid waste is generated from households, offices, shops,

markets, restaurants, public institutions, industrial units, hospitals, construction and

demolition sites, agricultural activities, etc. Improperly managed solid waste poses a risk to

human health and pollutes the environment, both locally and globally. Uncontrolled

dumping and improper handling causes several problems, at times irreversible

idea: We are a rice brand based out of Delhi which give the users a luxury of product customisation . We are currently serving institutions pan-India. We are on a verge of exponential growth if infused with funds at this stage. It can also help us to become a global brand within 3 years. We are currently serving clients like Specialty Restaurants Group (Mainland China, etc.), Radisson Group, The Fern Group, Absolute Barbecues, and many more! We look forward to expand throughout the country and eventually enter the retail sector.
name: Jugal Rambhiya

idea:
UINN FACILITY MANAGEMENT – INDIA’S PREMIER CORPORATE OFFICES, COMMERCIAL & RESIDENTIAL FACILITIES MANAGEMENT COMPANY

We are fully professional, technology-based, integrated facility Management Company providing 360° solutions for your premises.

We cater to the holistic needs of corporate houses, commercial establishments, and residential buildings. We provide a host of services, both HARD and SOFT and also undertake AMCs, repairs and a new supply of the same. Thus we act as a one-stop solution for all your facility management needs.

Our APP-based solutions enable you to manage all your facility management work, such as scheduling visits, tracking AMC work status, check BEFORE-AFTER work images, access full Audit reports and a whole lot more!

We are not just your vendor but your business partner. With us, the functioning of your premises is the last thing you worry about!

Let us nurture your premises while you nurture your business.
name: QUINN FACILITY MANAGEMENT SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a tech company creating products for B2B and B2C segments.

For B2B, we have created

ANEXA - a self growing BI tool that can be implemented in any company without any mandate for a data-warehouse 

HR tools like

  e-Analyse: This tool enables management to analyse the performance of the employees

  e-Engage: This tool gets engagement from the employees and helps to build a knowledge bank for all tacit information

  e-Perform: This enables management to capture the non-static performance of every employee and compare it with the goals set by him/her. With this you can do away with the normal yearly appraisal system 

  e-Asses: This enables employees to do a self test anytime on any topic from a bank of questions set by HR and their department heads

  e-Poll: Helps you conduct multiple employee surveys 

  e-Support: An electronic helpdesk across departments and locations with self escalation module



Over and above we have build 4 products of our own in the B2C segment
name: VTREND SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED
